Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 53rd overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2018...

Earned first career win on 6/3/2019...

1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $610,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2024, winning 2 games with a 0.57 ERA...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $814,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 4/21/2025 (Going to DET: P Dwight Harwell, P Tony Gonzalez. Going to CIN: P Samuel Valenzuela, 2B James Gallucci, P Robert Rhames)...
Injured on 6/8/2025 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/24/2025: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $8,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Injured on 9/13/2027 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/16/2028 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Detroit to Montreal on 6/5/2028 (Going to DET: 3B Jose Herrera. Going to MON: 3B Kevin McSherry, P Dwight Harwell, C Nestor Valls, P Joel Perez, P Richard Marmol)...
